mday.description: Matlab datetime(UTC). Derived from CR1000x posix time-stamp.
mday.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

RECORD.description: Record number assigned to each one-minute record. Assigned by CR1000x data logger.

posix.description: Campbell CR1000x internally recorded POSIX time; number of seconds since 1970/01/01 00:00:00 UTC
posix.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

bpr.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds
bpr.QC: Samples less than 900mbar are removed from sample average

lwr.description: Temperature compensated long wave down radiation
lwr.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

lwr_volts.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

lwr_btemp.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

swr.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

swr2.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

swr_volts.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

swr_btemp.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

wnde.sampling_method: Wind components are derived from wind speed, direction, and compass. wnde is a scalar average of twelve 5 second measurements.
wnde.note: Wind variables are relative to magnetic north. They are not rotated to true North.

wndn.sampling_method: Wind components are derived from wind speed, direction, and compass. wndn is a scalar average of twelve 5 second measurements.
wndn.note: Wind variables are relative to magnetic north. They are not rotated to true North.

wdir.sampling_method: Wind direction is derived from wind vane and compass. wdir represents a vector average of twelve 5 second measurements
wdir.note: Wind variables are relative to magnetic north. They are not rotated to true North.

wspd.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

wspd_min.sampling_method: smallest magnitude of wind speed chosen from twelve measurements taken every 5 seconds

wspd_max.sampling_method: largest magnitude wind speed chosen from twelve measurements taken every 5 seconds

compass.note: Magnetic declination depends on how compass enclosure is mounted to buoy. Nominally 40 degrees clockwise of buoy vane. Compass is relative to magnetic north. It has not been rotated to true North.
compass.sampling_method: Vector average of twelve 5 second measurements

vane.description: Direction of vane on RM Young Wind monitor
vane.sampling_method: Vector average of twelve 5 second measurements
vane.note: Wind variables are relative to magnetic north. They are not rotated to true North.

precip.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

sst.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

cond.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute

LAT.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

LON.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

gps_time.sampling_method: measured at the end of each minute
gps_time.note: gps_time may be recorded up to 5 seconds prior to mday and POSIX variables

load_mA.description: Total system load as recorded by CH200
load_mA.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

BATT.description: Battery voltage as recorded by CH200
BATT.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

temp_CR1000x.note: CR1000x is located in air-tight chassis, this will deviate from air temperature
temp_CR1000x.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds

temp_CH200.note: CH200 is located in air-tight chassis, this will deviate from air temperature
temp_CH200.sampling_method: Average of twelve samples taken every 5 seconds
